name: Buttons
heading: Easily create nice looking buttons, which come in different styles.
usage:
To apply this component, add the .uk-button class and a modifier such as .uk-button-default to an  or  element. Add the disabled attribute to a  element to disable the button.

Note If you are displaying a number of buttons in a row, you can add a top margin to them, when they stack on smaller viewports. Just add the uk-margin attribute from the Margin component to their parent element.
snippet: Link
